title: Drawing, "Sketches from the Niagara Falls, Terrapin Rocks and the Horseshoe with the Canadian bank.", March 19, 1856
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed according to Rudolph Berliner, 1943:  "Top of spray brown gold in sunlight"; "open sky"; "ice"; "green"; "cedars"; "...(/) shadow"; "white water"; "rock"; "snow". Caption: "Niagara" and the date.
description: Horizontal distant view from Goat Island.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from the Niagara Falls, Terrapin Rocks and the Horseshoe with the Canadian bank.", March 19, 1856.
March 19, 1856. Graphite on light brown paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-316-a.
